Introduction

Jo Jin Ho is a South Korean singer and the main vocalist of PENTAGON under Cube Entertainment. Before joining PENTAGON, he debuted in 2010 as a member of SM Entertainment’s project group SM the Ballad, where he gained recognition for his vocal ability.

Jinho officially debuted with PENTAGON on October 10, 2016, with their self-titled mini-album PENTAGON. In addition to his group activities, he has been active in musical theater.
